Package io.netty5.channel.kqueue

Class KQueueDatagramChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty5.util.DefaultAttributeMap
      • io.netty5.channel.AbstractChannel<P,​L,​R>
        • io.netty5.channel.kqueue.KQueueDatagramChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Channel, ChannelOutboundInvoker, DatagramChannel, UnixChannel, AttributeMap, FuturePromiseFactory, Comparable<Channel>
    @UnstableApi
public final class KQueueDatagramChannel
extends AbstractChannel<P,​L,​R>
implements DatagramChannel

                            SocketAddress localAddress)
                     throws Exception
        Connect to the remote peer
        Parameters:
        remoteAddress - the address of the remote peer.
        localAddress - the local address of this channel.
        Returns:
        true if the connect was completed, false if AbstractChannel.finishConnect() will be called later again to try finishing the connect.
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown on error.
